abilities.title: Protection Protocols
abilities.text: After an allied Separatist Alliance Primary unit makes a move action, this unit can use this ability. Choose a character in the activating Primary Unit . One character from this unit can perform a towards the chosen character. Bodyguard Allied Primary characters within 2 and allied Secondary characters within 2 of a character in this unit have COVER [1] Intercede While this Unit is not Wounded, enemy characters Engaged with one or more characters in this Unit cannot target allied Primary characters or allied Secondary characters with attacks.
